import { ProductConsumer } from './Context' import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ButtonContainer } from './Button' import style from 'styled-components' export default function Modal () { return ( {value => { const { modalOpen, closeModal } = value const { img, title, price } = value.modalProduct if (!modalOpen) { return null } else {
it added to cart
{title}

price: $ {price}

{closeModal()}}> store {closeModal()}}> go to cart
} }}
) }
